welcomeTo: Welcome to largest art community in the Nordics
artPortableDescription: Your Artportable portfolio is a tool that helps you present your art in a professional way. Artportable is a meeting point for artists, art buyers and art enthusiasts.
youCanAlwaysUpdateYourMembership: You can always update your membership package

free.name: Free
free.subtitle: Art lover - get a free account today and find original artwork.
listTexts: Chat and send inquiries about artwork
Read articles and get updates about exhibitions

portfolio.name: Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: Artist - boost your art career and get inquiries using Portfolio.
listTexts: Chat and get inquiries about your artwork
Pay 0 % in commission on sold artwork
Follow and interact with other artists
Read articles and get updates about exhibitions

portfolioPremium.name: Portfolio Premium
portfolioPremium.subtitle: For artists who want to be prioritized and gain access to more benefits.
listTexts: Chance to be selected and featured on Artportable's homepage and social media

portfolioPremiumPlus.name: Portfolio Premium Plus
portfolioPremiumPlus.subtitle: For artists who want to maximize their visibility and sales. Artportable helps you open doors to new opportunities by letting your works reach an even larger audience.
listTexts: Visibility in Artportable's newsletter every month
